title: ðŸš¨Browns hire Kevin Stefanski as head coach - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and John Breech to react to the Browns hiring Kevin Stefanski to be their next head coach. The guys examine Stefanski's coaching history, address potential concerns with the move and evaluate ownership's role in the frequent coaching turnover in Cleveland. Will, Ryan and John also discuss candidates that didn't get the job including Robert Saleh and Josh McDaniels. Lastly the guys assign winners/losers of the Stefanski hiring and predict how the Browns will finish in 2020.
